Class DrawableFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component

                      com.phybots.gui.DisposeOnCloseFrame
                          com.phybots.gui.DrawableFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public abstract class DrawableFrame
extends DisposeOnCloseFrame

Abstract JFrame with a simple panel drawn by paint2D(Graphics2D).

Author:
Jun Kato
See Also:
DisposeOnCloseFrame, paint2D(Graphics2D), Serialized Form
